response: Welcome to our module on scooter ownership made easy. Discover convenient features like home service and seamless charging with a portable charger that plugs into a regular socket. Benefit from our expanding network of hyperchargers, offering up to 50 kilometers range in just 15 minutes. Enjoy free charging for a limited period and easy service booking from our app. Experience predictive AI maintenance and 24/7 roadside assistance. Save more with lower running costs - ride up to 1 kilometer for just 17 paise on Ola S1, and save ₹77,316 in one year. Thank you.
